card.name: Abuna's Chant
card.property: Choose one — • You gain 5 life. • Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Armed Response
card.property: Armed Response deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of Equipment you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Raksha watched as the goblins continued to pour onto the Razor Fields. "They just don't know when to stop, do they?"

card.name: Auriok Champion
card.property: Protection from black and from red Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her will shall banish the shadows. Her might shall punish the lawless. Her beauty shall restore the light." —Ushanti, leonin seer

card.name: Auriok Salvagers
card.property: {1} {W}: Return target artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Memnarch or the vedalken salvage most of the large machines, leaving us only scraps. Scraps are enough."

card.name: Auriok Windwalker
card.property: Flying {T}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each generation, a handful of Auriok girls are allowed to visit the Cave of Light. They return riding the wind and brandishing steel.

card.name: Beacon of Immortality
card.property: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cave floods with light. A thousand rays shine forth and meld into one.

card.name: Bringer of the White Dawn
card.property: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Artifacts
card.property: {2}: The next time an artifact source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Memnarch shall rage against us. We shall endure."

card.name: Leonin Squire
card.property: When Leonin Squire enters the battlefield, return target artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I may be kha, but without my soldiers, my people, I am nothing." —Raksha Golden Cub

card.name: Loxodon Anchorite
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The loxodon ascribe religious superiority to those born albino, believing them to be spiritually pure.

card.name: Loxodon Stalwart
card.property: Vigilance {W}: Loxodon Stalwart gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long ago, the Auriok attempted peace with the loxodons. The leonin attempted war. Neither succeeded.

card.name: Raksha Golden Cub
card.property: Vigilance As long as Raksha Golden Cub is equipped, Cat creatures you control get +2/+2 and have double strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some believe that Raksha, youngest of the kha, is the reincarnation of Dakan, the first and mightiest of leonin leaders.

card.name: Retaliate
card.property: Destroy all creatures that dealt damage to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok learned perseverance from their forebears. They learned justice from the leonin.

card.name: Roar of Reclamation
card.property: Each player returns all artifact cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yesterday's relics will determine the outcome of tomorrow's war." —Ushanti, leonin seer

card.name: Skyhunter Prowler
card.property: Flying, vigilance (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If what I have seen comes to pass, we will need our guardians more than ever." —Ushanti, leonin seer

card.name: Skyhunter Skirmisher
card.property: Flying, double strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like dawn's first light, blind the unprepared and banish the shadows." —Skyhunter creed

card.name: Stand Firm
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Stasis Cocoon
card.property: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though the grip of a golem is strong, the grip of Auriok magic is far stronger.

card.name: Steelshaper's Gift
card.property: Search your library for an Equipment card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some blades seek their own wielders.

card.name: Vanquish
card.property: Destroy target blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All beings have an inner light. Let me show you yours." —Ushanti, leonin seer

card.name: Acquire
card.property: Search target opponent's library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes "innovation" means "stealing another's secret before anyone else can."

card.name: Advanced Hoverguard
card.property: Flying {U}: Advanced Hoverguard gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are like their vedalken masters: untouchable, aloof, and omnipresent." —Bruenna, Neurok leader

card.name: Artificer's Intuition
card.property: {U}, Discard an artifact card: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Beacon of Tomorrows
card.property: Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Shuffle Beacon of Tomorrows into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To look into its light is to meet the gaze of history.

card.name: Blinkmoth Infusion
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Untap all artifacts.

card.name: Bringer of the Blue Dawn
card.property: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, you may draw two cards.

card.name: Condescend
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Disruption Aura
card.property: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay its mana cost."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vedalken weapons sold to outsiders are as dependable as the vedalken themselves.

card.name: Early Frost
card.property: Tap up to three target lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Under its mists, the earth sleeps.

card.name: Eyes of the Watcher
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Fold into Aether
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, its controller may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Æther portals drift across Mirrodin's surface, dragging creatures across time and space.

card.name: Hoverguard Sweepers
card.property: Flying When Hoverguard Sweepers enters the battlefield, you may return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They only appear in emergencies, and emergencies never last long.

card.name: Into Thin Air
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Return target artifact to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Perhaps I should take Mirrodin apart and begin again." —Memnarch

card.name: Plasma Elemental
card.property: Plasma Elemental can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I watched a ship sail right through it. I thought it was harmless . . . until I saw what it had done to the crew." —Bruenna, Neurok leader

card.name: Qumulox
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the clouds bend themselves to Memnarch's will, eager to swallow those who oppose him.

card.name: Serum Visions
card.property: Draw a card. Scry 2.

card.name: Spectral Shift
card.property: Choose one — • Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another. (This effect lasts indefinitely.) • Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (This effect lasts indefinitely.) Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Thought Courier
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is telling of the vedalkens' culture that they trust human couriers more than their own comrades.

card.name: Trinket Mage
card.property: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Vedalken Mastermind
card.property: {U}, {T}: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken see other beings from a cold distance, as either experimental subjects or objects of study.

card.name: Beacon of Unrest
card.property: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

card.name: Blind Creeper
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, Blind Creeper gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shuns everything except its next meal.

card.name: Bringer of the Black Dawn
card.property: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2 life. If you do, search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Cackling Imp
card.property: Flying {T}: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its laughter drives needles through your mind.

card.name: Desecration Elemental
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever a player casts a spell, sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its precious corpses dance like puppets to attract mindless nim prey.

card.name: Devour in Shadow
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Feel the burn of the mists. Master them. They will devour your enemies." —Geth, keeper of the Vault

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The necrogen may have taken its sight, but it can still taste the fear of its prey.

card.name: Ebon Drake
card.property: Flying Whenever a player casts a spell, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The deadliest killers serve only those who are not afraid to die.

card.name: Endless Whispers
card.property: Each creature has "When this creature dies, choose target opponent. That player puts this card from its owner's graveyard onto the battlefield under their control at the beginning of the next end step."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who find death under the black sun's shadow cannot escape its pull.

card.name: Fill with Fright
card.property: Target player discards two cards. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Fleshgrafter
card.property: Discard an artifact card: Fleshgrafter gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Necrogen enflames certain emotional centers in the Morioks' brains: hate, aggression, and especially greed.

card.name: Lose Hope
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Mephidross Vampire
card.property: Flying Each creature you control is a Vampire in addition to its other creature types and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

card.name: Moriok Rigger
card.property: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Moriok Rigger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Moriok scavenge for weapons, for armor, for food—and ultimately for their souls.

card.name: Night's Whisper
card.property: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Moriok call the black moon the Whisperer. At her apex, she whispers of power.

card.name: Nim Grotesque
card.property: Nim Grotesque gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the swirling mists, you could walk right up to one and not know until its teeth are in your throat.

card.name: Plunge into Darkness
card.property: Choose one — • Sacrifice any number of creatures. You gain 3 life for each sacrificed creature. • Pay X life, then look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and exile the rest. Entwine {B} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Relentless Rats
card.property: Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats. A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

card.name: Shattered Dreams
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an artifact card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Victims are lucky if they remember ever having had what was lost.

card.name: Vicious Betrayal
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice any number of creatures. Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature sacrificed this way.

card.name: Beacon of Destruction
card.property: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to any target. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Great Furnace's blessing is a spectacular sight, but the best view comes at a high cost.

card.name: Bringer of the Red Dawn
card.property: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, you may untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Cosmic Larva
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Cosmic Larva unless you sacrifice two lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For millennia they wandered from plane to plane, devouring all metal. Finally, their wanderings are over.

card.name: Feedback Bolt
card.property: Feedback Bolt deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path of least resistance is often through your enemies.

card.name: Furnace Whelp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Baby dragons can't figure out humans—if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

card.name: Goblin Brawler
card.property: First strike Goblin Brawler can't be equipped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perhaps he shuns technology. Perhaps he appreciates nature. Perhaps he doesn't know the difference.

card.name: Granulate
card.property: Destroy each nonland artifact with converted mana cost 4 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There aren't that many ways to destroy a solid steel weapon, but somehow the goblins keep finding new ones.

card.name: Ion Storm
card.property: {1} {R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter or a charge counter from a permanent you control: Ion Storm deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When enough artifacts lie too long in the same place, their magical radiation weakens reality, opening rifts of unpredictable destructive power.

card.name: Iron-Barb Hellion
card.property: Haste Iron-Barb Hellion can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you feel a rumble in the ground, hold perfectly still. One sound will bring the hellion.

card.name: Krark-Clan Engineers
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, I jammed the whatsit into the whackdoodle, but I think I broke the thingamajigger."

card.name: Krark-Clan Ogre
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Krark Clan believes it's caught an ogre. The ogre believes he's caught seven goblins.

card.name: Magma Giant
card.property: When Magma Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its open mouth is a furnace blast that blisters the skin. Its smoking fists are meteors that split the earth.

card.name: Magma Jet
card.property: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.

card.name: Magnetic Theft
card.property: Attach target Equipment to target creature. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among the Vulshok, the most prized blades are those that killed their original owners.

card.name: Mana Geyser
card.property: Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Quicksilver Sea hissed and bubbled at the indignity. The Vulshok shaman just smiled.

card.name: Rain of Rust
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target land. Entwine {3}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Mirrodin, mages who call upon the power of rust are shunned by their people and often turn mercenary to survive.

card.name: Reversal of Fortune
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may copy an instant or sorcery card in it. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why learn hundreds of spells when you can learn only one and use it to steal hundreds?"

card.name: Screaming Fury
card.property: Target creature gets +5/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's got an axe to grind.

card.name: Spark Elemental
card.property: Trample, haste (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vulshok shamans summon spark elementals to burn paths through thick underbrush—or through goblin salvage squads.

card.name: Vulshok Sorcerer
card.property: Haste {T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vulshok sorcerers train by leaping into electrified storm clouds. Dead or alive, they come back down with smiles on their faces.

card.name: All Suns' Dawn
card.property: For each color, return up to one target card of that color from your graveyard to your hand. Exile All Suns' Dawn.

card.name: Beacon of Creation
card.property: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token for each Forest you control. Shuffle Beacon of Creation into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A chorus of life heralds the arrival of Mirrodin's final sun.

card.name: Bringer of the Green Dawn
card.property: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Channel the Suns
card.property: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To some the birth of the fifth sun was a sign of doom. To others it was a sign of salvation. But to all it was a sign.

card.name: Dawn's Reflection
card.property: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional two mana in any combination of colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only Sylvok magic could truly capture the perfection of a Mirrodin sunrise.

card.name: Eternal Witness
card.property: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

card.name: Fangren Pathcutter
card.property: Whenever Fangren Pathcutter attacks, attacking creatures gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tracking a fangren pack is easy. Catching up to one is fatal." —Viridian scout

card.name: Ferocious Charge
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Joiner Adept
card.property: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A talented apprentice makes all things. The master makes all things possible.

card.name: Ouphe Vandals
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice Ouphe Vandals: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source and destroy that artifact if it's on the battlefield. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ouphes finally managed to still the clockwork monstrosity by catching themselves in its cogs.

card.name: Rite of Passage
card.property: Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (The damage is dealt before the counter is put on.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every scar is a lesson, every battle a test of what you have learned.

card.name: Rude Awakening
card.property: Choose one — • Untap all lands you control. • Until end of turn, lands you control become 2/2 creatures that are still lands. Entwine {2}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Sylvok Explorer
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any creature on a druid's shoulder is his family, any land under his feet his home.

card.name: Tangle Asp
card.property: Whenever Tangle Asp blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have no fangs, yet I constantly bite. I have no scales, yet I slither through you. What am I?" —Riddle of the viper's venom

card.name: Tel-Jilad Justice
card.property: Destroy target artifact. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Tel-Jilad Lifebreather
card.property: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Tangle loans you life. Spend it well."

card.name: Tornado Elemental
card.property: When Tornado Elemental enters the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to each creature with flying. You may have Tornado Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Tyrranax
card.property: {1} {G}: Tyrranax gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It outnumbers you one to many.

card.name: Viridian Lorebearers
card.property: {3} {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A small band of elves pledged many years ago to avoid the Edges of Forgetting. They have remained hidden until now.

card.name: Viridian Scout
card.property: {2} {G}, Sacrifice Viridian Scout: It deals 2 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They know a hoverguard's only blind spot is directly above it.

card.name: Anodet Lurker
card.property: When Anodet Lurker dies, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These machines build fearsome visages out of scrap metal to scare off predators who would otherwise be eager to consume them.

card.name: Arachnoid
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It follows the green sun over Mirrodin's surface, spinning massive webs of whispersilk as it goes.

card.name: Arcbound Wanderer
card.property: Modular—Sunburst (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Avarice Totem
card.property: {5}: Exchange control of Avarice Totem and target nonland permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Souls and steel, the essence of Mirrodin. Memnarch lacks one but has an abundance of the other.

card.name: Baton of Courage
card.property: Flash Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) Remove a charge counter from Baton of Courage: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Battered Golem
card.property: Battered Golem doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, you may untap Battered Golem.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A dent marks every year of service, and it has as much rust as glory.

card.name: Blasting Station
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Blasting Station deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may untap Blasting Station.

card.name: Chimeric Coils
card.property: {X} {1}: Chimeric Coils becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The energy that infuses the rings with life also melts them away, leaving only useless puddles of slag.

card.name: Clearwater Goblet
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain life equal to the number of charge counters on Clearwater Goblet.

card.name: Clock of Omens
card.property: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Untap target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those near the clock don't hear it anymore, but their every movement is in time with its ticking.

card.name: Composite Golem
card.property: Sacrifice Composite Golem: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It binds the five suns in human form.

card.name: Conjurer's Bauble
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Conjurer's Bauble: Put up to one target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the moment of discovery, the triumph of the mind, the reimagining of past glory.

card.name: Cranial Plating
Crucible of Worlds
card.property: You may play lands from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.

card.name: Door to Nothingness
card.property: Door to Nothingness enters the battlefield tapped. {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All memory of your existence will be wiped from reality. You will die, and no one will mourn." —Memnarch

card.name: Doubling Cube
card.property: {3}, {T}: Double the amount of each type of unspent mana you have.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cube's surface is pockmarked with jagged runes that seem to shift when unobserved.

card.name: Energy Chamber
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target artifact creature. • Put a charge counter on target noncreature artifact.

card.name: Engineered Explosives
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) {2}, Sacrifice Engineered Explosives: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Engineered Explosives.

card.name: Ensouled Scimitar
card.property: {3}: Ensouled Scimitar becomes a 1/5 Spirit artifact creature with flying until end of turn. (Equipment that's a creature can't equip a creature.) Equipped creature gets +1/+5. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Eon Hub
card.property: Players skip their upkeep steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its power source is time itself. It absorbs unused minutes and hours, bringing the end of existence always closer.

card.name: Etched Oracle
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) {1}, Remove four +1/+1 counters from Etched Oracle: Target player draws three cards.

card.name: Ferropede
card.property: Ferropede can't be blocked. Whenever Ferropede deals combat damage to a player, you may remove a counter from target permanent.

card.name: Fist of Suns
card.property: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is all in my grasp. Every petty dream, every grand scheme, every soul, every fear. It all flows through me and from me." —Memnarch

card.name: Gemstone Array
card.property: {2}: Put a charge counter on Gemstone Array. Remove a charge counter from Gemstone Array: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Outside, it reflects the suns' light. Inside, it harvests the suns' power.

card.name: Goblin Cannon
card.property: {2}: Goblin Cannon deals 1 damage to any target. Sacrifice Goblin Cannon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblin cannon crews are known not for their aim but for their ability to dive for cover.

card.name: Grafted Wargear
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+2. Whenever Grafted Wargear becomes unattached from a permanent, sacrifice that permanent. Equip {0} ({0}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Grinding Station
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard. Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, you may untap Grinding Station.

card.name: Guardian Idol
card.property: Guardian Idol enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}: Guardian Idol becomes a 2/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn.

card.name: Healer's Headdress
card.property: Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn." {W}{W}: Attach Healer's Headdress to target creature you control. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Heliophial
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) {2}, Sacrifice Heliophial: It deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to any target.

card.name: Helm of Kaldra
Horned Helm
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has trample. {G}{G}: Attach Horned Helm to target creature you control. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Infused Arrows
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) {T}, Remove X charge counters from Infused Arrows: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

card.name: Krark-Clan Ironworks
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the junk, refuse, and offal of the Krark Clan is diligently collected, melted down, and made into more junk, refuse, and offal.

card.name: Lantern of Insight
card.property: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed. {T}, Sacrifice Lantern of Insight: Target player shuffles their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each eye sees a different possibility for tomorrow.

card.name: Lunar Avenger
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) Remove a +1/+1 counter from Lunar Avenger: Lunar Avenger gains your choice of flying, first strike, or haste until end of turn.

card.name: Mycosynth Golem
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Artifact creature spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. (They cost {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

card.name: Myr Quadropod
card.property: {3}: Switch Myr Quadropod's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each myr was designed to fill a specific role. This one, for example, was designed to stomp on other myr.

card.name: Myr Servitor
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Myr Servitor is on the battlefield, each player returns all cards named Myr Servitor from their graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Krark Clan enjoys pulling them apart just to watch them reassemble one another.

card.name: Neurok Stealthsuit
card.property: Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) {U}{U}: Attach Neurok Stealthsuit to target creature you control. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Opaline Bracers
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of charge counters on Opaline Bracers. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Paradise Mantle
card.property: Equipped creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color." Equip {1}

card.name: Pentad Prism
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) Remove a charge counter from Pentad Prism: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Possessed Portal
card.property: If a player would draw a card, that player skips that draw instead. At the beginning of each end step, each player sacrifices a permanent unless they discard a card.

card.name: Razorgrass Screen
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Razorgrass Screen blocks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hand-stitched, and marked by the blood of the Auriok.

card.name: Razormane Masticore
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Razormane Masticore unless you discard a card. At the beginning of your draw step, you may have Razormane Masticore deal 3 damage to target creature.

card.name: Relic Barrier
card.property: {T}: Tap target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its transmissions are the word of Memnarch. It speaks, and metal bows.

card.name: Salvaging Station
card.property: {T}: Return target noncreature artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Whenever a creature dies, you may untap Salvaging Station.

card.name: Sawtooth Thresher
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) Remove two +1/+1 counters from Sawtooth Thresher: Sawtooth Thresher gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Silent Arbiter
card.property: No more than one creature can attack each combat. No more than one creature can block each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars say that arbiters exist on every world, created by an unknown hand to enforce justice.

card.name: Skullcage
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Skullcage deals 2 damage to that player unless they have exactly three or exactly four cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a focused mind can survive it.

card.name: Skyreach Manta
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the dawns break, the manta soars.

card.name: Solarion
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) {T}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Solarion.

card.name: Sparring Collar
card.property: Equipped creature has first strike. {R}{R}: Attach Sparring Collar to target creature you control. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Spinal Parasite
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) Remove two +1/+1 counters from Spinal Parasite: Remove a counter from target permanent.

card.name: Staff of Domination
card.property: {1}: Untap Staff of Domination. {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life. {3}, {T}: Untap target creature. {4}, {T}: Tap target creature. {5}, {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Summoner's Egg
card.property: Imprint — When Summoner's Egg enters the battlefield, you may exile a card from your hand face down. When Summoner's Egg dies, turn the exiled card face up. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Summoning Station
card.property: {T}: Create a 2/2 colorless Pincher creature token. Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may untap Summoning Station.

card.name: Suncrusher
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) {4}, {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Suncrusher: Destroy target creature. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Suncrusher: Return Suncrusher to its owner's hand.

card.name: Suntouched Myr
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the fifth sun joins the other four, new abilities awaken in the creatures of Mirrodin.

card.name: Synod Centurion
card.property: When you control no other artifacts, sacrifice Synod Centurion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We order them to stand, they stand. We order them to wait, they wait. We order them to die, they die." —Pontifex, elder researcher

card.name: Thermal Navigator
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Thermal Navigator gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes off with a roar of superheated wind, startling wild pterons as they survey the ground below.

card.name: Vedalken Orrery
card.property: You may cast spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The model incorporated the fifth sun effortlessly, as if it had always known.

card.name: Vedalken Shackles
card.property: You may choose not to untap Vedalken Shackles during your untap step. {2}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of Islands you control for as long as Vedalken Shackles remains tapped.

card.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.
